Pantou - Winery

Pandou Estate was founded in 1997 and is located in the Hydrousa region of Florina, at the northern end of Greece.

The estate's privately owned vineyards are divided into 6 vineyards, each with its own rootstock, clone and variety that suits the region's climate, giving the wines the identity of the place of production.
